Name: Chair Spinning Simulator
About the game: Chair Spinning Simulator is an ultra-fast-paced 60-second game where you accumulate spin on your chair and blast off into space, destroying everything in your path towards your goal. Gameplay Spin Your Chair As Fast As Possible! Fly your chair into space as high as possible! Get money Upgrade chair Try again! Features Chair Spinning Destruction Of Rocks and Local Fauna Space Soundtrack by This is the Glasshouse Specials thanks to playtesters that help out with the development of the game! They are: Void Red, TinyGodot, friends and family!
